Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.common.jmx.notifications

JmxNotification that can be sent are in the list CjdbcNotificationList.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CjdbcNotificationList This is the list of the C-JDBC notification that can be sent from the mbean server on the controller.
JmxNotification This class defines a JmxNotification class.
 

Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.common.jmx.notifications Description

JmxNotification that can be sent are in the list CjdbcNotificationList.
JmxNotification themselves are created from the JmxNotification class and are serialized via xml.
